info.name: Soundcloud - MadDark (Night/Dark)
info.description: A rather clean dark version of soundcloud. Including custom home & discover buttons (And rearranges). Support: Click here

style.css: @-moz-document domain(soundcloud.com) {::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px;}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:#353535;}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:#c24700;border-radius: 15px;}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background: #555;}li.g-tabs-item a.g-tabs-link:not(.active){color: rgb(255, 85, 0) !important;}body, .l-top.sc-border-box, .userMain .dropbar .dropbar__content, div#content, .commentForm__wrapper, .soundActions{background: rgb(19, 19, 19);color: #fff;border: rgba(19, 19, 19, 0);}#app{background: rgb(10, 10, 10);}.sc-border-light-right, .sc-border-light-bottom, .sc-border-light-top, .sc-border-light-left{border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);}.sc-button{transition: all 0.3s;}.sc-button:hover{color: rgb(0, 0, 0);}.sc-button.sc-button-like.sc-button-selected:hover{background-color: #000;color: #fff;}.l-sidebar-right .streamSidebar{transition: all 0.3s;top: -253px;}.l-sidebar-right .l-fixed{transition: all 0.3s;top: 80px !important;}.trackItem.active{background: rgb(255, 51, 0);}.trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active a.trackItem__trackTitle, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active .trackItem__numberWrapper{color: #fff;}.trackItem .trackItem__additional .soundActions button:hover{transition: all 0.3s;background: rgb(255, 255, 255);}.trackItem:not(.m-disabled).hover:hover a.trackItem__username, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).hover:hover a.trackItem__trackTitle{transition: all 0.3s;color: #fff;}.trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active a.trackItem__username:hover, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active a.trackItem__trackTitle:hover, .trackItem:not(.active) a.trackItem__trackTitle:hover, .trackItem:not(.active) a.trackItem__username:hover{transition: all 0.3s;color: #000;}.trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active .trackItem__additional, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active .trackItem__additional .soundActions, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active .trackItem__actions .sc-button, .trackItem .trackItem__additional, .trackItem .trackItem__additional .soundActions, .trackItem .trackItem__actions .sc-button, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).hover .trackItem__additional, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).hover .trackItem__additional .soundActions, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).hover .trackItem__actions .sc-button{background: none;}.trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active .trackItem__additional .soundActions button{min-width: 22px;}.trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active .trackItem__additional .soundActions button:hover, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).hover .trackItem__additional .soundActions button:hover {transition: all 0.3s;background: rgb(255, 255, 255);}.trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active .trackItem__additional .soundActions .sc-button-active{background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);}.trackItem:not(.active):hover {transition: all 0.1s;background: #ff5500;}.trackItem:not(.m-disabled).active .trackItem__actions, .trackItem:not(.m-disabled).hover .trackItem__actions {background: #fff;}/* Player controls */.paging-eof:before{background-color: #ff5500;border-radius: 5px;}.playControls__inner, .playControls__bg{background: #0a0a0a;border-top: none;}.playControls__queue .queue.m-visible{background: #000;color: #fff;border: none;}.playControls__queue .queue__scrollable .queue__itemWrapper{background: #000;}.playbackSoundBadge__actions button:hover{background: #fff;}/*comment form*/.commentForm .commentForm__wrapper .commentForm__input{background: #000000;border: none;outline: none;color: #fff !important;}.soundContext__usernameLink, .soundTitle__title span{color: #ff5000 !important;}.sc-button-pause{background: rgb(255, 51, 0);}.commentForm.m-active .commentForm__wrapper{background: none;border: none;}.commentForm.m-active .commentForm__wrapper .commentForm__input{transition: all 0.3s;border: 1px solid #ff5000;padding: 0px 0px 0px 8px;}/*menu*/.g-tabs-link{color: #fff !important;transition: all 0.2s;}.g-tabs-link:hover, .g-tabs-link:focus{border: none;color: #999999 !important;}.g-tabs-link.active{color: #ff5500 !important;}/* listening page */.listenEngagement{border: none;border-color: transparent;}.sc-button-like, .sc-button-repost, .sc-button-share, .sc-button-more{background-color: #fff;color: #000;}.sc-button-like:hover, .sc-button-repost:hover, .sc-button-share:hover, .sc-button-more:hover{background-color: #000;color: #fff;border-color: #ff5500;}.sc-button-group .soundActions__purchaseLink, .soundStats li .sc-ministats, .sc-ministats-group li .sc-ministats, .userBadge__usernameLink .sc-truncate, .playbackSoundBadge__titleLink, .playableTile__descriptionContainer .playableTile__mainHeading, .userBadgeListItem__title .userBadgeListItem__heading{transition: all 0.2s;color: #fff;}.sc-button-group .soundActions__purchaseLink:hover, .soundStats li .sc-ministats:hover, .sc-ministats-group li .sc-ministats:hover, .userBadge__usernameLink .sc-truncate:hover, .sc-truncate.playbackSoundBadge__lightLink:hover, .playableTile__usernameHeadingContainer .playableTile__usernameHeading:hover{transition: all 0.2s;color: #ff5500;}.truncatedAudioInfo.m-overflow.m-collapsed .truncatedAudioInfo__wrapper::after{background: rgb(0, 0, 0);background: linear-gradient(rgba(19, 19, 19, 0), rgba(19, 19, 19, 1)90%, rgb(19, 19, 19));}.g-link-problem{padding: 4px 10px 10px 10px;}.reportCopyright.sc-link-medium:hover, .playbackSoundBadge__titleLink:hover, .playbackTimeline__duration span, .playableTile__descriptionContainer .playableTile__mainHeading:hover, .userBadgeListItem__title .userBadgeListItem__heading:hover{color: #ff5500;}/* description */.truncatedAudioInfo__content p{color: #fff;}.removeFromNextUp, .removeFromNextUp:hover{background-color: #fff;}li.g-tabs-item a.g-tabs-link:not(.active){color: rgb(255, 85, 0) !important;}.g-tabs-link.active, .g-tabs-link.active:hover, .g-tabs-link:hover{border-color: rgb(255, 85, 0);color: rgb(255, 85, 0);border-bottom: solid 1px;cursor: default;}.g-tabs-link:hover{cursor: pointer;}.l-hero-content{margin: 25px;}/*User Added*/.header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem[data-menu-name="home"], .header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem[data-menu-name="home"]:hover, .header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem.selected[data-menu-name="home"], .header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem.selected[data-menu-name="home"]:hover, .header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem[data-menu-name="stream"], .header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem[data-menu-name="stream"]:hover, .header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem.selected[data-menu-name="stream"], .header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem.selected[data-menu-name="stream"]:hover{color: transparent !important;transition: all 0.2s;}a.header__navMenuItem[data-menu-name="home"]:after{content: "Discover";}a.header__navMenuItem[data-menu-name="stream"]:after{content: "Home";}a.header__navMenuItem[data-menu-name="home"]:after, a.header__navMenuItem[data-menu-name="stream"]:after{transition: all 0.2s;font-size: 17px;position: absolute;top: 50%;left: 50%;transform: translate(-50%, -50%);color: rgb(255, 116, 0);font-weight: 500;font-family: "Interstate", "Lucida Grande", "Lucida Sans Unicode", "Lucida Sans", Garuda, Verdana, Tahoma, sans-serif;}.header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem:hover::after, .header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem.selected:hover::after{color: rgb(51, 51, 51) !important;}.header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem:hover, .header__navMenu a.header__navMenuItem:hover{background: rgb(255, 116, 0);transition: all 0.2s;}.queueItemView:hover, .queueItemView.m-active{background: rgb(80, 80, 80) !important;}.queueItemView__meta a{color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;opacity: 1;font-size: 14px;}.queueItemView__title a{color: rgb(255, 255, 255);}.queueItemView__meta a:hover, .queueItemView__title a:hover{color: rgb(255, 85, 0) !important;}.queueItemView:hover, .queueItemView.m-active{background: rgb(80, 80, 80) !important;}button.sc-button-like[title="Unlike"]:hover{background: rgb(0, 0, 0);}.queue__panel{background-color: rgb(255, 52, 0);color: rgb(255, 255, 255);background-image: linear-gradient(to top, rgb(255, 52, 0), rgb(255, 118, 0));}.modal.modalWhiteout{background-color: rgba(45, 45, 45, 0.9);}.tabs .tabs__tabs,.tabs .tabs__content .g-modal-section{background: rgb(10, 10, 10);}.tabs .tabs__content ul li a{color: rgb(255, 255, 255);}article.infoStats{color: rgb(255, 255, 255);}a.sc-link-dark, .sidebarHeader__more{color: rgb(255, 85, 0);}a.sc-link-dark:hover,.sc-truncate a:hover{color: #fff;transition: all 0.3s;}.truncatedUserDescription.m-overflow.m-collapsed .truncatedUserDescription__wrapper::after{background: linear-gradient(rgba(255, 255, 255, 0), rgb(19, 19, 19));}.audibleEditForm__form {background-color: rgb(8, 8, 8);}.audibleEditForm__form div.tokenInput__wrapper{background: rgb(105, 105, 105) !important;border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204);}.linkMenu .linkMenu__list{background: rgb(23, 23, 23);}}
